nodes.text: Vesti noodles were a type of noodle. The humans Chirrut Îmwe and Baze Malbus shared an evening meal of exceptionally bland vesti noodles in their home in Jedha City on the moon Jedha while they discussed robbing the Galactic Empire for supplies to give to a local orphanage during the Jedha insurgency.
Vesti noodles first appeared in the novel Guardians of the Whills, which was written by Greg Rucka and released on May 2, 2017.
